Memorial Gymnasium.title: Facility Operations Assistant – Outdoor Support (Student Wage)
Memorial Gymnasium.conciseDescription: Assist with maintaining outdoor spaces and equipment for UVA Recreation. Ensure cleanliness, set up/take down gear, and report maintenance issues.
Memorial Gymnasium.requirements: Must be able to work independently and lift 50 lbs.
Memorial Gymnasium.responsibilities: Clean, organize, and move recreational equipment. Monitor outdoor areas for safety.

Bond House.title: Karsh Institute of Democracy Research Assistant (Student Wage)
Bond House.conciseDescription: Support democracy research projects by gathering sources and editing bibliographies. Assist with project organization and data entry.
Bond House.requirements: Detail-oriented with strong reading and writing skills.
Bond House.responsibilities: Research, compile reading materials, and support faculty-led projects.

Peabody Hall.title: Office Assistant (Student Wage) Federal Work Study Eligible
Peabody Hall.conciseDescription: Provide administrative support for office tasks such as answering phones, scanning, and organizing files.
Peabody Hall.requirements: Eligible for Federal Work Study. Good communication and organization skills.
Peabody Hall.responsibilities: Office support, phone handling, and file management.

Bryan Hall.title: Student Instructor Assistant (SIA), ARCH/GSVS (Graduate Student Wage)
Bryan Hall.conciseDescription: Assist ARCH/GSVS instructors with grading, Canvas uploads, and student correspondence. No in-class responsibility required.
Bryan Hall.requirements: Familiarity with course tools and ability to work independently.
Bryan Hall.responsibilities: Manage course logistics, digital content, and communication.

Booker House.title: Student Data Science Analyst (Federal Work Study Eligible)
Booker House.conciseDescription: Work with Enrollment Intelligence & Analytics on survey research and data projects. Ideal for students with R/Python experience.
Booker House.requirements: Knowledge of R or Python. Strong analytical and writing skills.
Booker House.responsibilities: Survey analysis, data visualization, and institutional research.

2400 Old Ivy Road.title: Community Resilience Research Assistant (Student Wage)
2400 Old Ivy Road.conciseDescription: Assist IEN with research on climate resilience, justice, and energy transition. Help manage projects and analyze interviews.
2400 Old Ivy Road.requirements: Interest in climate/justice topics; research experience preferred.
2400 Old Ivy Road.responsibilities: Data collection, literature review, and stakeholder interviews.

2400 Old Ivy Road.title: IEN Student Research Assistant (SRA) - Chesapeake Bay Stakeholder Assessment (Student Wage)
2400 Old Ivy Road.conciseDescription: Support stakeholder assessment for Chesapeake Bay with IEN. Analyze interviews and literature, and assist with workshop design.
2400 Old Ivy Road.responsibilities: Qualitative analysis, note-taking, and event preparation.

Hotel D.title: Undergraduate Student Teaching Consultants (Student Wage)
Hotel D.conciseDescription: Provide peer feedback and consultation to instructors. Observe classes and support evidence-based teaching improvements.
Hotel D.responsibilities: Conduct observations, write reports, and meet with instructors.

Monroe Hall.title: Office Assistant (Student Wage)
Monroe Hall.conciseDescription: Support general office duties for the Undergraduate College of A&S. Includes event staffing and file organization.
Monroe Hall.responsibilities: Front desk work, event setup, and administrative tasks.

Darden Faculty.title: Darden Graduate Statistical Research Assistant
Darden Faculty.conciseDescription: Assist Darden professors with statistical research, data cleaning, and academic projects. Great for PhD-bound students.
Darden Faculty.requirements: Experience with R, Stata, or Python. Research interest required.
Darden Faculty.responsibilities: Statistical programming, literature review, and research support.
